title: 2220 N Geneva Terrace 1/2 block from Oz Park! 3 bd 2 ba
map_address: 2220 N Geneva Terrace near Webster Ave
posting_body: Spacious 3 bedroom / 2 bath in Prime Lincoln Park location.
Across the street from Oz Park, Target, Divvy bike Oz Park station, Dairy Queen, restaurants and bars on Lincoln, Webster, nearby Halsted and Clark.
Short walk to CTA Red Line Fullerton stop.
Easy walk to CTA 22, 36 and 151 bus stops.
This beautiful three bed/two bath unit features a spacious open concept living and dining area plus a huge kitchen with  massive island.
Hardwood flooring throughout, two full baths, in unit washer/dryer and central AC.
Great kitchen with stove and oven, microwave, refrigerator, ample cabinetry, cooking/eating island, double sink.
